name: NorDash
description:
Gameplay:

A single-player game where you control 2 Norse goats, Snir and Jóst, across the Asgard plains! Gain speed as you run farther without bumping into any obstacles. If you maintain this enough, they may join together into Gigagoat for maximum food eating capabilities! However, this power comes at a price - it may be harder to control Gigagoat than you think. Eat as much as you can to get a high score!

Backstory:

On one fine day in Asgard, the almighty Thor enjoyed his morning chariot ride, pulled by the fine majestic beasts, Snir and Jóst. Suddenly the overwhelming, mouthwatering aroma of glorious Norwegian cuisine permeated the air. To Thor’s horror, his loyal companions broke free from their royal harness’ in their fit of desperation to satiate their voracious hunger.

Controls:

Control Snir (Left Goat) using WAD to move left, right, and jump.

Control Jóst (Right Goat) using the left, right, and up arrow keys to move left, right, and jump.

Press spacebar when Gigagoat's meter appears to join together!

Control Gigagoat by using BOTH WAD and up, down, and up arrow keys simultaneously.
